room_title: Escape room "Archaeologist's Adventure" by Cville Escape Room in Charlottesville
review: We did the archaeological room and it was absolutely amazing! The theme, atmosphere, and ambiance, was on point! Clues were fun, took some thought and kept with the theme. Staff was wonderful! Price was super affordable and I'm already looking forward to doing it again!

room_title: Escape room "Archaeologist's Adventure" by Cville Escape Room in Charlottesville
review: This was the first escape room game for me and we chose the Archaeology room. It took a few minutes to figure out how it all works as there were about a dozen lock boxes, lots of paintings and a radio playing oldies from the forties. However, once we got started we rolled well using the clues which took us to another room. Itâ€™s well worth the ticket and make sure you bring 4-5 people with you. The lady in charge was nice and friendly. We are definitely going back.
